Colossal 2–{3}{R} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with two +1/+1 counters; or pay {3}{R} as a sorcery: Put two +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
When Emberhound’s colossal ability puts one or more counters on it, target creature can’t block this turn.
notes:
“I’ve faced a cerberus. This one should be easy.”
—Teraklos of Meletis, last words
